'''Li'l Woody''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A cute, short pirate working with [Captain Tatzatl](/captainTatzatl/) of the Divine Barge, Woody gets the job to guard the door to their quarters in the refuge.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =[The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Man of Chimes](/theManOfChimes/): Woody stands guard outside the door you need to cross.

[Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)
